It is characterized by its large, showy flowers that can reach up to 10 centimeters in diameter, often displaying vibrant colors such as red, orange, and yellow. The plant typically grows on trees or rocky surfaces, utilizing its aerial roots to absorb moisture and nutrients from the environment.
